2810B8F0.Line7.7FA05: I can’t do it. It wouldn’t work anyway.

5A334C6A.Line1.7FA05: Yes. I bet Lorath still wears his. The Order’s mission was his lifeblood.

6E8CB2DA.Line17.BAE4: What you lack in faith, you have in allies.

8E1C3F6E.Line5.7FA05: And for what? You saw how that ended. My son... (choke)

AD87FBD5.Line21.BAE4: Yes. You’re the only one who can help us.

C2053272.Line9.7FA05: You don’t understand. The stuff soulstones are made of...they’re old as the Eternal Conflict itself. With magic so primordial, you need faith, you need spirit. I have none.

C93CB297.A beat after: :  like he's taking it in, reflecting on his life.

D7101683.Line19.7FA05: (sigh) I can't make any promises. Really. But...

F427C5EC.Line3.7FA05: I couldn’t give up my life for it, not like him. I wanted to be a man. I left to chase family, fellowship, glory...

F5747EDE.Line23.7FA05: I can try. For you two, I’ll try. Let’s hear what the old man has to say.

FB3FFC35.MenuLabel: “Is that your Horadric amulet on the table?”
